name: runahr
description: We will need to create an endpoint in rails[RunaHR app] to receive data from an external system and save it in the database. After saving we will need to display that data in existing client [RunaHR] application on a new page. This node application was built with Crowdbotics www.crowdbotics.com

COOKIE_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SESSION_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of session.
